tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@

param.name: stats_type
param.label: Studying ...
param.option: Compute the transition and transversion ratios for the snps (--tstv)
Compute the transition/transversion ratios for the snps in the coding regions (--tstv-coding)
Compute the transition/transversion ratios for the snps in the non-coding regions (--tstv-noncoding)
Compute the type and count of the snps (--snp-counts)
Calculate the site frequency spectrum of the variants (--sfs)
Compute the pair-wise genetic distance between each sample (--mds)
Return the total variants per sample, sum of homozygous and heterozygous variants (--vars-by-sample)

tool.help:
**What it does**
The stats tool computes some useful variant statistics for a GEMINI database.
$ gemini stats --summarize "select * from variants where in_dbsnp=1 and chrom='chr1'" my.db sample total num_het num_hom_alt M10475 1 1 0 M128215 1 1 0 M10478 2 2 0 M10500 2 1 1
